metadata.description: Spells that control, direct, and manipulate plants, wood, and plant-based materials

spells.name: Dance of the Staves
spells.description: This spell causes wooden objects to move and fight as if wielded by invisible warriors. Staves, clubs, and other wooden weapons can attack enemies autonomously, defending the caster or following simple commands.
spells.guidelines: Base 4 (control wooden objects), +2 Voice, +1 Concentration, +2 Group

spells.name: Bend with the Whispering Wind
spells.description: This spell allows the caster to control the movement of living plants, making them bend, twist, and move as desired. Trees can lower branches, vines can reach out to grab objects, and bushes can part to create paths.

spells.name: Tangle of Grasping Roots
spells.description: This spell causes roots and undergrowth to grow and move rapidly, creating a tangled maze that impedes movement. The plants actively grasp at anyone trying to pass through, potentially holding them fast until they can break free.
spells.guidelines: Base 4 (control plant growth and movement), +2 Voice, +1 Concentration, +2 Room

spells.name: Bridge of Entwined Branches
spells.description: This spell causes tree branches and vines to interweave and strengthen, forming a natural bridge across gaps, rivers, or ravines. The bridge is sturdy enough to support multiple people and their equipment, and blends naturally with the forest environment.

spells.name: Shelter of the Verdant Haven
spells.description: This spell causes plants to grow and shape themselves into a comfortable shelter, complete with walls, roof, and furnishings. The structure provides protection from weather and includes basic amenities formed from living wood and leaves.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (create plant structures), +1 Touch, +2 Sun, +3 Structure

spells.name: Command the Wooden Sentinel
spells.description: This spell animates a tree or large wooden construct, giving it the ability to move and follow simple commands. The tree can uproot itself to walk around, use its branches as arms to manipulate objects, and serve as a guardian or laborer.

spells.name: Straighten the Warped Wood
spells.description: This spell straightens and shapes wooden objects, removing warps, bends, and imperfections. Crooked staves become perfectly straight, warped planks flatten, and damaged wooden items are restored to their proper form.

spells.name: Forest's Swift Passage
spells.description: This spell allows the target to merge with and travel through trees. They can step into one tree and emerge from another tree of the same species within a mile. The journey takes only moments and provides concealment and rapid movement through forests.

spells.name: Wall of Thorny Brambles
spells.description: This spell causes thorny plants to grow rapidly into a thick defensive wall. The barrier is difficult to pass through due to the sharp thorns, and attempts to force passage result in painful wounds. The wall provides excellent defensive fortification.

spells.name: Bonds of Creeping Vine
spells.description: This spell causes vines and creepers to grow rapidly and entangle a target, binding them securely. The plants wrap around the victim's arms and legs, making escape very difficult. The bonds tighten if the victim struggles.

spells.name: Transform the Staff to Serpent
spells.description: This spell transforms a wooden staff or branch into a living serpent that obeys the caster's commands. The snake retains the approximate size and shape of the original wood but gains all the abilities of a real serpent, including the ability to bite and constrict enemies.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (major transformation), +1 Touch, +2 Sun, +1 Animal requisite
